item.title: Most Popular Online Games of 2022
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Most Popular Online Games of 2022 Most Popular Online Games of 2022 G6 Stories 5 Call of Duty Mobile Call of Duty Mobile is a battle royale game and revolves around wars. 4 Fortnite Fortnite is another popular survival and Battle Royale Game played by many people across the world. It has four major game modes - Battle Royale, Party Royale, Creative, and Save the World. 3 Apex Legends Apex Legends is a free online Battle Royale Game where 20 three-person squads or 30 two-person teams will hunt for weapons and supplies to assemble themselves in an attempt to defeat other players.

item.title: Top 10 Free Games Websites For Online Gaming
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Top 10 Free Games Websites For Online Gaming Top 10 Free Games Websites For Online Gaming G6 Stories 10 Miniclip.com Miniclip.com features free online games related to action, adventure, and several other genres. Some games suffer from lag, but the overall variety and quality is good. Play Games 9 Kongregate.com Kongregate.com features free online games that don't require you to log via Facebook. Play Games 8 Babygames.com Babygames.com have the newest babysitting, dress-up, makeover, animal, puzzle and many other games for kids.

item.title: The 10 best movies of all time
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> The 10 best movies of all time The 10 best movies of all time G6 Stories 2001 - A Space Odyssey (1968) Stanley Kubrick met sci-fi seer Arthur C Clarke, and together they forged a story of technological progress and disaster that's steeped in humanity. An audience of stoners adopted 2001 as their pet movie, and it still fe The Godfather (1972) Francis Ford Coppola's operatic Mario Puzo adaptation is the ultimate patriarch of the Mafia genre and features a legendary baptism sequence, superbly edited in parallel to the murdering of four rivalling dons.

item.title: The best Halloween movies of all time
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> The best Halloween movies of all time The best Halloween movies of all time G6 Stories The Texas Chain Saw Massacre (1974) If you haven't already done so, work up the courage to see Tobe Hooper's criminally underrated classic, Texas. It is the scariest movie ever made. Suspiria (1977) Dario Argento's grim fairy tale about a timid American dancer who enrols at a spooky European ballet academy has some gnarly death scenes and a hair-raising score.

item.title: 10 Last-Minute Halloween Costumes Ideas
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 10 Last-Minute Halloween Costumes Ideas 10 Last-Minute Halloween Costumes Ideas G6 Stories Zombies Shred old clothes using scissors and razor blades then stained them with coffee grinds and attached grass using spray adhesive. 3 parts corn syrup, one part water, red food colouring, flour to thicken to make fake blood. 1 ministylehacker 2 Tinker Bell Costume Swing by the costume shop for a pair of wings, or order on Amazon—there's still time for two-day shipping!

Buy on Esty The Comfy Teddy Bear Wearable Blanket Is it a blanket? Is it a sweatshirt? Does it really matter when it's as comfy as this? 2 Buy on Amazon Reasons Why I Love You Notebook Fill this blank notebook with every single reason, then watch his or her tears flow!

item.title: Why Do We Celebrate Halloween on October 31?
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Why Do We Celebrate Halloween on October 31? Why Do We Celebrate Halloween on October 31? G6 Stories Halloween was born many years ago and is celebrated on the last Saturday of October. It was originally celebrated on May 13 but was moved to October 31 by Pope Boniface IV. Facts The word Halloween comes from All Hallows' Eve and means hallowed evening. Halloween falls on October 31 because the ancient Gaelic festival of Samhain occurred on this day.

item.title: 6 warm Halloween costume ideas for kids
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 6 warm Halloween costume ideas for kids 6 warm Halloween costume ideas for kids G6 Stories Farmer Be prepared and have a thinner flannel shirt on hand just in case Mother Nature decides to gift a warm Halloween evening. Astronaut Astronaut suits are always puffy and you can fit a sweatshirt and sweatpants underneath without looking odd. Animals There's nothing odd about seeing a bear, deer or squirrel with a little extra plush this time of year.

item.title: Best Halloween Episodes to Stream in 2022
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Best Halloween Episodes to Stream in 2022 Best Halloween Episodes to Stream in 2022 G6 Stories Friends - The One With the Halloween Episode It is the best Halloween episode of all time and stars Monica, Chandler, Ross, Rachel, Sean Penn and Gunther as various characters. Stranger Things Will, Dustin, Mike and Lucas dress up as the Ghostbusters for Halloween, and Eleven is stuck at home by the order of Hopper.

item.title: New York Halloween Events and Activities
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> New York Halloween Events and Activities New York Halloween Events and Activities G6 Stories Frights for the Family At the annual Bronx Halloween Parade, beginning at noon on Oct. 22, the New York Police Department marching band, the Philadelphia 76ers drum line and dozens of community organizations will haunt the streets. NYCRuns Haunted Island NYCRuns Haunted Island 5K and 10K takes place on Oct. 29 and provides age and gender-specific awards.

item.title: 5 Horror Movies Based on True Stories
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> 5 Horror Movies Based on True Stories 5 Horror Movies Based on True Stories G6 Stories 1 Annabelle The Conjuring franchise's favourite demonic doll is real in the sense that a real-life Raggedy Anne doll named Annabelle amctheatres.com 2 The Conjuring The Conjuring movies are based on the real life exploits of paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren. imdb.com 3 The Amityville Horror The Amityville Horror franchise started out leaning into the idea that it was a true story really hard, but over time got sillier and sillier.

item.title: Top 5 Best Hollywood Movies in 2022
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Top 5 Best Hollywood Movies in 2022 Top 5 Best Hollywood Movies in 2022 G6 Stories 5 Thor Love and Thunder Thor Love and Thunder is a comic adventure film starring Natalie Portman, Christian Bale, Chris Hemsworth, and Taika Waititi. 4 The Batman The Batman series is an action film starring Robert Pattinson as Batman, directed and distributed by Matt Reeves and Warner Bros. Pictures, DC Films Production companies.
